entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a famous Quidditch player. He entered the marquee and was causing a stir amongst the veela cousins.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and cousin. Krum offered to show him his seat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Ron's cousin. He has red curly hair.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry and Ron.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins. He told Harry to sit down.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley twins.

entities.name: veela cousins
entities.description: The veela cousins were causing a stir due to Krum's appearance.

relationships.description: Krum offered to show Ron his seat.
Harry is a friend of Krum's, as referred to by Krum himself.
